author: Doug Bostrom
content:
Construction details here: https://www.chasse-maree.com/grain-de-sail-une-goelette-de-fret-daujourdhui-1/

The boat itself is beautifully made, employing stringer/frame details more along the lines of what we’d see in an aircraft, presumably to wring out dead weight.
